                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =480
                    Top =300
                    Width =9360
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =12
                    TabIndex =1
                    Name ="Text30"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf(([TeamEx]=True Or [TEAM]=True) And [Type]<>\"T\",IIf([SplitPrize]=True,\"**"
                        "TEAM: MEMBERS SPLIT  \",\"**TEAM: EACH MEMBER RECEIVES  \"),\" \") & [Prize]"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x8e7b02de6c3d1e4ab56adebe76f537c3
                    End

                End
                Begin CheckBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    Left =10080
                    Top =60
                    ColumnWidth =1080
                    TabIndex =2
                    Name ="TeamEx"
                    ControlSource ="TeamEx"
                    StatusBarText ="No longer supported (Rev237 only)"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xc5b589cac2be54478ef50afe74ebfc0b
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =10080
                    LayoutCachedTop =60
                    LayoutCachedWidth =10340
                    LayoutCachedHeight =300
                    Begin
                        Begin Label
                            Visible = NotDefault
                            Left =10080
                            Top =300
                            Width =675
                            Height =225
                            Name ="Label59"
                            Caption ="TeamEx"
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x89ba45d222063a499b03940548a53b8e
                            End
                            LayoutCachedLeft =10080
                            LayoutCachedTop =300
                            LayoutCachedWidth =10755
                            LayoutCachedHeight =525
                        End
                    End
                End
            End
        End
        Begin BreakHeader
            KeepTogether = NotDefault
            CanGrow = NotDefault
            CanShrink = NotDefault
            Height =0
            BreakLevel =4
            Name ="GroupHeader4"
            GUID = Begin
                0x51aff9c89a345c45b6ae012152453023
            End
        End
        Begin Section
            KeepTogether = NotDefault
            CanGrow = NotDefault
            Height =960
            OnFormat ="[Event Procedure]"
            Name ="Detail"
            GUID = Begin
                0x47534d369a7af74bba2cd05aaa2f240b
            End
            Begin
                Begin TextBox
                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =600
                    Width =5640
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =12
                    FontWeight =700
                    Name ="tbWinner"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf([Win_EXN]=0,\"ERROR: EXN = 0  ( Set to 98 or 99 if 'Not Awarded' )'\",IIf(["
                        "Type]=\"S\",\" \",IIf([Win_EXN]<101,[Desc_FN] & \" \" & [Desc_LN] & \":   \" & ["
                        "WinNameFNFirst],IIf([Win_EXN]>2999,[Desc_FN] & \" \" & [Desc_LN],IIf([Type]='T',"
                        "[WinNameFNFirst] & \"(Teacher)\",[WinNameFNFirst])))))"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x488276eae3721f41ad38375d87e2c14d
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =600
                    LayoutCachedWidth =6240
                    LayoutCachedHeight =300
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =6360
                    Width =3720
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =10
                    TabIndex =1
                    Name ="tbStudInfo"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf([Win_EXN]=0,\"Error \",IIf([Type]=\"S\",\" \",IIf([Win_EXN]>100 And [Win_EX"
                        "N]<3000,IIf(IsNull([SEX]),\"  \",IIf([SEX]=\"F\",\"Female\",\"Male\")) & \"  Grd"
                        ": \" & [Grade] & \"  Cat: \" & [NCAT] & \" Exn: \" & [Win_EXN],\" Special Winner"
                        "\")))"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x9cecce373931154b88422fa68fd9ab9b
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =6360
                    LayoutCachedWidth =10080
                    LayoutCachedHeight =300
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =6360
                    Top =300
                    Width =3900
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =12
                    TabIndex =2
                    Name ="tbTeacher"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf([Win_EXN]>100 And [Win_EXN]<3000,IIf([Type]<>'T',\"Teacher: \" & [ThFN] & \""
                        " \" & [ThMI] & \" \" & [ThLN],\"Student: \" & [FNAME] & \" \" & [MI] & \" \" & ["
                        "LNAME]),IIf([Win_EXN]>2999,\"Teacher: \" & [SWFN] & \" \" & [SWMI] & \" \" & [SW"
                        "LN],\"\"))"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xff58bb4a69e9dc4e85e99abba767deef
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =6360
                    LayoutCachedTop =300
                    LayoutCachedWidth =10260
                    LayoutCachedHeight =600
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =660
                    Top =300
                    Width =5460
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =12
                    TabIndex =3
                    Name ="tbSchool"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf([EXN]>100 And [EXN]<3000,[SCHOOL],[SWSch])"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x62123b11459a9b4bb860a5b1c49bf7ae
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =660
                    LayoutCachedTop =300
                    LayoutCachedWidth =6120
                    LayoutCachedHeight =600
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    CanGrow = NotDefault
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Left =660
                    Top =600
                    Width =9300
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =12
                    TabIndex =4
                    Name ="tbExhibitTitle"
                    ControlSource ="=IIf([Win_Exn]>100 And [Win_EXN]<3000,\"Title: \" & [EXHB_TITLE] & \"'\",[S_EXHB"
                        "_TITLE])"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x0956decbc5fe4540870f809ab899f572
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =660
                    LayoutCachedTop =600
                    LayoutCachedWidth =9960
                    LayoutCachedHeight =900
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    TextFontFamily =34
                    Width =600
                    Height =300
                    FontSize =10
                    TabIndex =5
                    Name ="tbTeam"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x2c27519ccbf9be43a9d883bb91c4c7c4
                    End

                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    Left =10320
                    Top =360
                    Width =300
                    TabIndex =6
                    Name ="F_ORD"
                    ControlSource ="F_ORD"
                    StatusBarText ="Form Order: Order of Student on Entry Form"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xf55b3cb99e702944b34250d077508d4e
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =10320
                    LayoutCachedTop =360
                    LayoutCachedWidth =10620
                    LayoutCachedHeight =600
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    Left =10380
                    Width =240
                    ColumnWidth =570
                    TabIndex =7
                    Name ="PN"
                    ControlSource ="PN"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x39f52fc0ae1ca644ac48b700d1ceca61
                    End

                    LayoutCachedLeft =10380
                    LayoutCachedWidth =10620
                    LayoutCachedHeight =240
                    Begin
                        Begin Label
                            Visible = NotDefault
                            Left =10080
                            Width =300
                            Height =225
                            Name ="Label10"
                            Caption ="PN:"
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x8e4ea6e0be10e04f8febf342fa40940b
                            End
                            LayoutCachedLeft =10080
                            LayoutCachedWidth =10380
                            LayoutCachedHeight =225
                        End
                    End
                End
            End
        End
        Begin PageFooter
            Height =0
            Name ="PageFooterSection"
            GUID = Begin
                0xe49e1e5545c28e4e8f6a736e700acdf6
            End
        End
    End
End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private msg As String
Private LastExn As Integer
Private LastAN As Integer
Private NextAN As Integer
Private LastGN As Integer
Private AwdRetreat As Integer
Private NewPage As Boolean
Private NoDetail As Boolean   ' Rev 5.3.0 used to hide certain fields

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
  LastAN = Me.AN
  AwdRetreat = 0
End Sub

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Retreat()
 'GroupHeader 1 is Award Data
 If AwdRetreat = 0 Then
   NextAN = Me.AN
 Else
   LastAN = Me.AN
 End If
 AwdRetreat = AwdRetreat + 1
End Sub

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader2_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader2 is Group Data

End Sub


Private Sub GroupHeader2_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader 2 is Group Data
End Sub

Private Sub PageHeaderSection_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
   Dim count As Integer
    'If IsEmpty(Me.AN) Then Exit Sub
    'If IsNull(Me.AN) Then Exit Sub
    
    

   
   'If AwdRetreat > 0 Then
     If Me.AN = LastAN Then
     
     End If
     If NextAN <> LastAN And Me.AN <> 0 Then
       Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""
     Else
       Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""   ' later"TEST *********************"
     End If
   'End If
   'AwdRetreat = 0
End Sub
Private Sub PageHeaderSection_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
  'AwdRetreat = 0
 ' If NewPage = True And Me.AN = LastAN And Me.GrpGN = LastGN Then
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = "TEST *********************"
 ' Else
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""
 ' End If
End Sub

Private Sub Detail_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
' Detail is Prize Data and Winner Data
 ' This part no work yet - trying to put awardname and group desc on
 ' top of report when it continues on next page  (could set property repeat = yes)
 ' but this does not add the word continued and repeats the Award description also
 '  way too much info.   next try doing this in the print events instead of the
 ' format events
 ' If NewPage = True And (Me.AN = LastAN And Me.GrpGN = LastGN) Then
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = "TEST *********************"
 ' Else
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""
 ' End If
    
  Me.tbTeam.FontBold = False
  Me.tbTeam.ForeColor = 0
  tbTeam = ""
  'Rev 5.4.0   added checks for for TeamEx
  If Me.F_ORD = 1 And Win_EXN > 100 And (Me.TeamEx = True Or InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "TEAM") > 0) Then
    Me.tbTeam.ForeColor = 255
    Me.tbTeam.FontBold = True
    tbTeam = "T# 1"
  End If
  If Me.F_ORD > 1 Then
  'Rev 5.4.0 added teamex
    If Me.TeamEx = True Or InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "TEAM") > 0 Then
      If Me.Win_EXN > 100 Then 'And Me.Win_EXN = LastEXN Then  ' have another student for same Prize
       tbTeam = "T# " & Me.F_ORD
      End If
    End If
  End If
  LastExn = Me.Win_EXN
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Report_NoData(Cancel As Integer)
  MsgBox "No Records Found"
  
  Cancel = True
End Sub

Private Sub Report_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Prior to running the report I must fill in a field used in the sort and
  '   grouping.  The field is in AwardPrize called Script_Sort
  ' For each record in AwardPrize get type and use table AwardPrizeSort to get
  ' the sort order and put it into Script Sort
  ' ALSO  It is difficult to predict and sort etc if EXN and Stud_Num are
  '   Blank (null) so I fix all nulls to '0' here
  
  ' Open both tables
  Dim AwdPrizeRS As Recordset
  Dim AwdPrizeSortRS As Recordset
  Dim holdsortnum As Integer
  Dim AwdRS As Recordset
  Dim holdtype As String
  Dim oneActive As Boolean
  Dim oneInactive As Boolean
  Dim doActive As Boolean
  Dim oneError As Boolean
  Dim awn As Integer
  Dim Winexn As Integer
  Set AwdPrizeRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardPrize", dbOpenDynaset)
  Set AwdPrizeSortRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardPrizeSort", dbOpenDynaset)
  'First  Fill in the temporaty field Script_Sort in AwardPrize Table
  '    based on the lookup table AwardPrizeSort
  ' This sets up the order of the prizes listed in the script, For instance
  ' if a prize has a Prize.type = 'S' for script, then it is placed as sort order 2 the lowest
  ' this is the 4th sort order (see details below)
  With AwdPrizeRS
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
       holdtype = IIf(IsNull(!Type), " ", !Type)
       With AwdPrizeSortRS
          .FindFirst ("Type = '" & holdtype & "'")
          If Not .NoMatch Then
             holdsortnum = !sort
          Else
             holdsortnum = 0  ' for unknown types make it sort at top
          End If
       End With
       .Edit
       If IsNull(!EXN) Then !EXN = 0
       If IsNull(!Stud_Num) Then !Stud_Num = 0
       ' Rev 5.3.0 I changed the grouping and sorting to group on script_sort instead
       ' of sorting on script_sort. That would group any prizes with
       ' DIFFERENT PRIZES TOGETHER SO... I have to do something to make prizes with
       ' the same TYPE but different prizes group separately.
       ' Since this is a numeric field I have to change the sort number based on
       ' some number that is different if the text in 'prize'  is different
       '  checksum of the prize memo field.
       Dim prztxt As String
       Dim iji As Integer
       Dim Cksum As Long
       If IsNull(!Prize) Then
          prztxt = ""
       Else
           prztxt = !Prize
       End If
    '  If !GID = 52401 Then  ' testing
    '     iji = 0
    '  End If
       Cksum = 0
    '  add up the values of every character in the prize description
    '  Note:  Normally these are the same text for a given Type of prize but
    '  This will help list the different prizes because the grouping will be
    ' different.   I could do more extensive work on this but for now it will
    '  probably work ok if the prizes in a specific group are different.
    '  NOTE: Help for SciFairMaster will indicate that all prizes of a given
    '        Prize TYPE must be the same and have the same text.
       For iji = 1 To Len(prztxt)
         Cksum = Cksum + Asc(Mid(prztxt, iji, 1))
       Next iji
       '  get the last two digits of the check sum
       Cksum = Cksum - (100 * Int(Cksum / 100))
       ' add the last two digits of the checksum to the sort number
       holdsortnum = 100 * holdsortnum + Cksum
       ' End of Rev 5.3.0 change  -----
       !Script_Sort = holdsortnum
       .Update
       .MoveNext
    Loop
  End With
  ' Now set the DEFAULT criteria for searching records specific to the Script
  msg = "[Status] = 'A' AND " & _
         "(NOT isnull(Win_EXN)) and Win_EXN <> 98 and Win_Exn <> 99 " & _
         "and Win_Exn <> 95"
    ' Above selects where Win_EXN = 0 but ScriptAssy will be 'X' for those"
    ' I.E.  Must enter 98 or 99 to avoid getting errors. A 0 (Zero) implies that
    '  no action was taken so we do not know if to be awared or not.
    ' The Win_Exn 95 is set automatically in the query xAwards wExhibits&Special Winners
    ' (See AwdRS below)  It is set if a team exibit is seleted and if
    ' F_ORD <> Stud_Num and a lot of other criteria (See function FixWinExn() in
    ' Module functions and also see EXN and WIN_EXN fields in the query
    
  Me.FilterOn = True
  Dim script As String
  script = InputBox("Select Active Awards Scripts:)?" & vbCrLf & _
           " A  ALL Scripts - Combined,Junior,Senior,Errors" & vbCrLf & _
           " C  Combined Assembly Script " & vbCrLf & _
           " S  Senior Assembly Script" & vbCrLf & _
           " J  Junior Assembly Script" & vbCrLf & _
           " X  ERRORS (Active but no winner or ??) " & vbCrLf & _
           "Select Other Options:" & vbCrLf & _
           " E  Win_Exhibit Number (Active Awds) " & vbCrLf & _
           " N  Notes (Script Announcements)(Active, WinExn= 100)" & vbCrLf & _
           " O  One (Any Award active or inactive)" & vbCrLf & _
           " I  Inactive Awards only (checks/tests" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "               --- See 'Help' for Script Details ---", "Script Options")
  oneInactive = False
  oneActive = False
  oneError = False
  Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data", dbOpenDynaset)
  With AwdRS
     .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'A'")
     If Not .NoMatch Then oneActive = True
     .FindFirst ("[Status] Is Null OR [Status] <> 'A'")
     If Not .NoMatch Then oneInactive = True
     .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'A' AND (isnull([ScriptAssy]) OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X')")
     If Not .NoMatch Then oneError = True
     .Close
  End With
  doActive = True
  Select Case script
  Case "I"      ' Not listed as option but possible
    doActive = False
    msg = "[Status] Is Null OR [Status] <> 'A'"  ' Tests only or what ever.
  Case "S"
     msg = "([ScriptAssy] = 'S' OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X') AND " & msg ' Senior Script & Errors
  Case "C"
     msg = "([ScriptAssy] = 'C' OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X') AND " & msg ' Combined Script & Errors
  Case "J"
     msg = "([ScriptAssy] = 'J' OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X') AND " & msg ' Junior Script & Errors
  Case "A"
    ' leave it as is  all active Combined, Junior, Senior , X (errors) assemblies
  Case "X"                                       '  Just the Errors (unknown Assembly)
     msg = "[Status] = 'A' AND (isnull([ScriptAssy]) OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X')"
  Case "O"   ' One award inactive or active
    awn = InputBox("Enter the Award Number", "Script for One Award Number")
     msg = "AwdAN = " & awn
  Case "0"   ' in case someone enters zero instead of letter O
    awn = InputBox("Enter the Award Number", "Script for One Award Number")
     msg = "AwdAN = " & awn
  Case "E"   ' Winning Exn = (use 100 to find script announcements)
    Winexn = InputBox("Enter the Winning Exhibit Number", "Script for Winning Exhibit")
     msg = "Win_EXN = " & Winexn & " AND [Status] = 'A'"
  Case "N"   ' Notes - scripts announcements active awards only
     msg = "Win_EXN = 100 AND [Status] = 'A' "
  Case Else
    MsgBox "Not an option!"
    Cancel = True
    Exit Sub
  End Select
  Me.Filter = msg '  & " and [awdan] = 18"  ' for test
  AwdPrizeRS.Close
  AwdPrizeSortRS.Close
  If doActive = True And script = "E" And oneError = False Then
    MsgBox ("There are no Errors")
    Cancel = True
  End If
  If doActive = True And oneActive = False Then
    MsgBox ("There are no Active records")
    Cancel = True
  End If
  If doActive = False And oneInactive = False Then
    MsgBox ("There are no InActive records")
    Cancel = True
  End If
  If script = "O" Or script = "0" Then
    Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data", dbOpenDynaset)
    With AwdRS
    .FindFirst (msg)
     If .NoMatch Then
        MsgBox ("No Such Award")
        Cancel = True
     End If
     .Close
    End With
  End If
  If script = "E" Then
    Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data", dbOpenDynaset)
    With AwdRS
    .FindFirst (msg)
     If .NoMatch Then
        MsgBox ("No Such Winning Exhibit Number in Active Awards")
        Cancel = True
     End If
     .Close
    End With
  End If
  If script = "N" Then
    Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data", dbOpenDynaset)
    With AwdRS
    .FindFirst (msg)
     If .NoMatch Then
        MsgBox ("No Active Notes (Win_EXN = 100)")
        Cancel = True
     End If
     .Close
    End With
  End If
  If script = "X" Then
    Set AwdRS = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data", dbOpenDynaset)
    With AwdRS
    .FindFirst (msg)
     If .NoMatch Then
        MsgBox ("No Errors!  You are ready to Print the Script!")
        Cancel = True
     End If
     .Close
    End With
     
  End If
  ' Rev 5.3.0
  If MsgBox("Show AN,GN, & Misc. Student Detail In Report?" & vbCrLf & " (Default is No)", _
        vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, "Detail?") = vbYes Then
     Label3.Visible = True
     AN.Visible = True
     Label47.Visible = True
     GrpGN.Visible = True
     Label10.Visible = True
     PN.Visible = True
     F_ORD.Visible = True
     tbStudInfo.Visible = True
  End If
  'Rev 5.3.0
  If MsgBox("Show Teacher Name and Exhibit Title" & vbCrLf & _
            "When the winner is an Exhibitor?   " & vbCrLf & " (Default is No)", _
        vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, "Detail?") = vbYes Then
     tbTeacher.Visible = True
     tbExhibitTitle.Visible = True
  End If
' Rev 5.3.0  Moved to Help
'  If MsgBox("Do you want to see all the nity gritty detail about" & vbCrLf & _
'            "how the Script is constructed and sorted? " _
'            , vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, "Script Detail Query") = vbYes Then
'    MsgBox "Notes and Reminders about the Active Awards Scripts" & vbCrLf & _
'         "1. ONLY Active Awards are listed!  (Very Important)   " & vbCrLf & _
'         "2. Winning EXN = 0 causes and Error (Printed at end of Scripts)" & vbCrLf & _
'         "3. Winning EXN = 95*, 98 or 99 are skipped" & vbCrLf & _
'         "    If a prize is not awared set EXN to 98 (Junior) or 99 (Senior)" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   *Setting Stud# >0 (in 'Awards Winners Entry' form)" & vbCrLf & _
'         "    selects a single specific team student as the prize winner." & vbCrLf & _
'         "     * The query 'xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data' " & vbCrLf & _
'         "        sets Win_Exn = 95 for all other team members.   " & vbCrLf & _
'         "4. Special Headings must be 'Active' and have EXN = 100" & vbCrLf & _
'         "5. TOC Awards Descriptions (Sponsored by ..) must match the " & vbCrLf & _
'         "      'Sponsor' Field in 'Categories' table!" & vbCrLf & _
'         "6. Which Assembly? " & vbCrLf & _
'         "    AwardMaster.C_Assem = true forces to Combined Assembly. " & vbCrLf & _
'         "    Exhibits Division forces to Junior or Senior Assembly." & vbCrLf & _
'         "    (If no Exhibit Division NCAT then Group.Div determines 'J' or 'S')"
'
'
'    MsgBox "Sort Details  " & vbCrLf & _
'         "Combined script uses AwardMaster.C_Assem_Sort field" & vbCrLf & _
'         "Junior and Senior use AwardMaster.J/S_Assem_Sort field" & vbCrLf & _
'         "    " & vbCrLf & _
'         " REPORT USES QUERY 'xAwards w/Exhibits&SpecWinners Data'" & vbCrLf & _
'         " Fields in the query determine various sorts. The 'criteria' set up" & vbCrLf & _
'         "      in the fields can be changed to change sort orders" & vbCrLf & _
'         "      however, do this with great caution:" & vbCrLf & _
'         "(next message has more details) "
'    MsgBox " Script Sort order and fields used:" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   1st= 'ScriptAssy': If EXN > 0 then 'C', 'J' or 'S'.  If EXN = 0 or error then 'X')" & vbCrLf & _
'         "      'C' if Awards.C_Assem = True (checked) " & vbCrLf & _
'         "      'J' or 'S' determined by: " & vbCrLf & _
'         "          Exhibit's Division. or   " & vbCrLf & _
'         "          If Exhibit's div N/A then Group.DIV else 'X'  " & vbCrLf & _
'         "   2nd= 'AssySort': 'C'ombined sorts by field 'C_Assy_Sort'." & vbCrLf & _
'         "         'J' & 'S' sort by field 'J/S_Assy_Sort'." & vbCrLf & _
'         "         Note: 'AN' at end of 'AssySort' ensures unique grouping" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   3rd= 'GrpGN'     (The Group part of GID)" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   4th= 'Script_Sort' This report fills the field 'Script_Sort'" & vbCrLf & _
'         "         using AwardPrize.Type and table AwardPrizeSort" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   5th= 'PN'            (Prize Number)" & vbCrLf & _
'         "   6th= 'F_ORD'       (Exhibit Student Form Order - For Teams)"
'  End If
'
  LastGN = -1
  LastAN = -1
  NextAN = -2
  AwdRetreat = 0
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
